scripts.prepub-gh: pnpm run build && git add . && git commit -m 'build' && git push
scripts.prepub-cf: pnpm run build-cf && git add . && git commit -m 'build-cf' && git push
scripts.publish-gh: git subtree split --prefix=dist -b temp-branch1 && git push origin temp-branch1:gh-pages --force
scripts.publish-cf: git subtree split --prefix=dist -b temp-branch1 && git push origin temp-branch1:gh-pages-cf --force
